history.content:
Let’s meet at the intersection of tech and ethics!

Tech + Social Impact is an organization that aims to create a tight-knit community in which members can explore, have candid conversations about, and take actions on ways to use technology for social good.

We are looking for bright and motivated students to lead and contribute to tech projects and community events. You will have the opportunity to build and work on your passion projects. Last semester, we primarily focused on teaching a decal called "Technology and Social Impact", and worked on creating an app powered by ML to help people speak and communicate more effectively.

Through this club, you will get the rare opportunity to network with industry professionals and academic experts in various fields, and you will get the chance to partner with some inspirational non-profit organizations.

This semester we will focus on hosting speaker series to engage the community on conversations surrounding ethics in various domains of technology, in addition to working on more tech for good projects.

COME TO OUR INFO SESSION NEXT THURSDAY (1/27) @ 4 PM!! 

Zoom Link: https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/91351130487?pwd=RkphTTMzQzRCRTgyRmJ1VTcrb0VEQT09

Join our community & apply here! We welcome all majors!

Application Form: https://forms.gle/mX1iPVbbdyom38iR7

 

Come be a part of the conversation!
history.subject: Join Tech+Social Impact for Spring 2022!
